name: MSC Industrial Direct Co., Inc.
description: MSC Industrial Direct Co., Inc. is a leading distributor of metalworking and maintenance, repair, and operations (MRO) products in North America. Founded in 1941, the company has built a strong reputation for providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service. MSC offers a comprehensive range of over one million products, including cutting tools, abrasives, fasteners, workholding, and safety equipment from various renowned manufacturers. The company's commitment to innovation is reflected in its extensive e-commerce platform, which enables customers to easily find and order the products they need. MSC serves a diverse customer base, including manufacturers, government agencies, and contractors, ensuring that they have the essential tools and supplies to maintain operational efficiency. With a focus on reliability and expertise, MSC is dedicated to helping its customers achieve their operational goals through superior product offerings and services. The company continuously invests in technology and training to enhance its capabilities and better serve its customers. As a publicly traded company listed on the New York Stock Exchange, MSC remains committed to delivering shareholder value while fostering a culture of integrity and excellence.

seo.meta_title: MSC Industrial Direct | Metalworking & MRO Products
seo.meta_description: Explore MSC Industrial Direct, a leading distributor of metalworking and MRO products. Discover our extensive product range and commitment to customer service.

faq.question: What does MSC Industrial Direct specialize in?
faq.answer: MSC Industrial Direct specializes in the distribution of metalworking and MRO products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of MSC Industrial Direct?
faq.answer: Evan L. Hart is the CEO of MSC Industrial Direct Co., Inc.

faq.question: Where is MSC Industrial Direct headquartered?
faq.answer: MSC Industrial Direct is headquartered in Melville, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does MSC offer?
faq.answer: MSC offers a variety of products including cutting tools, abrasives, safety equipment, and fasteners.

faq.question: When was MSC Industrial Direct founded?
faq.answer: MSC Industrial Direct was founded in 1941.
